name: IIHT
description: IIHT is an Indian training institute that offers courses in hardware and software technologies. The institute has multiple branches across India and provides undergraduate, diploma, and postgraduate diploma programs.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: OUR PLATFORM. YOUR ARSENAL.
ShortDescription: Our deep expertise and 25+ years of experience in corporate training enable us to create training programs that deliver highly engaging, immersive learning experiences that ensure learning agility.

Highlights.name: Customizable Learning Ecosystems
Highlights.description: IIHT offers customizable learning ecosystems that connect workforce learning data and training programs.This means that IIHT can create a learning experience that is tailored to the specific needs of each organization.

Highlights.name: Variety of Training Delivery Models
Highlights.description: IIHT offers a variety of training delivery models, including instructor-led training, online learning, and blended learning . This means that IIHT can provide a training solution that meets the needs of any learner.

Highlights.name: Hands-on Learning Experiences
Highlights.description: IIHT provides hands-on learning experiences that help learners apply their knowledge and skills to real-world situations . This can help learners to retain information and develop the skills they need to be successful in their careers.

enhanced_description: IIHT is an Indian training institute with over 25 years of experience in corporate training, specializing in hardware and software technologies. It offers undergraduate, diploma, and postgraduate diploma programs, and operates through multiple branches across India. IIHT provides highly engaging, immersive learning experiences designed to ensure learning agility, utilizing customizable learning ecosystems that connect workforce learning data and training programs. The institute offers a variety of training delivery models, including instructor-led, online, and blended learning, with a strong emphasis on hands-on learning experiences to help learners apply knowledge to real-world situations.
